description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) has a need for the manufacture and delivery one (1) heave compensated winch system, (including appropriate cable for operations) with the same specs as that is currently in use in the Pacific Region (for monitoring and research of Marine Protected Areas (MPAs) and marine refuges with drop camera instrumentation). All the deliverables must be received on or before March 31, 2024. There are no security requirements associated with this solicitation of offers. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. Reference the solicitation for further details.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
=====================

### Title

Heave Compensated Winch System
------------------------------

### Tender Announcement Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4273656498-Doc4273764811
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4273656498
* **Publication Date**: 27-Oct-2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: 07-Dec-2023 14:00:00
* **Last Amendment Date**: 30-Nov-2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 30-Nov-2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: TBD

### Notice Type

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) for the manufacture and delivery of one (1) Heave Compensated Winch System.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **procurementMethod**: Competitive – Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Limited Tendering Reason**: None
* **Trade Agreements**: Compliant with the WTO GPA and several Free Trade Agreements (FTAs)

### Deliverables

The successful bidder will be required to deliver one (1) Heave Compensated Winch System with the following specifications:
* Compatible with the current equipment used in the Pacific Region
* Includes a suitable cable for operations
* Shall be delivered on or before 31-Mar-2024

### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Name: Matthew Furlong (il-lui / he-him)
	+ Email: [matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca][]

### Bidder Requirements

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. 

### Source URL

You can find the tender announcement details at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17845955?extsite=MTc4NDU5NTVf
